name: Outside Inside Backpacker's Tumbling Tower
description: Standing only 16cm when assembled this compact tumbling tower is small enough to take with you anywhere.  Included dice add another element of challenge to this classic game.Lightweight and packable.Game includes 45 solid wood blocks, wood die, instructions and carry pouch.Dimensions (assembled) are 15 x 5 x 5cm.For 2 or more players.
